entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
